https://tmrev.io/movie/940207-Crusts 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null "Crusts" combines a searing drone soundtrack with footage of mysterious architectural and natural artifacts. The film evolves from meditations on concrete physical textures to a complete stroboscopic transfiguration of the image. The footage is accompanied by a crushing, hypnotic onslaught of guitar and electronic noise by White/Light. Crusts
